mapper.select:
SELECT f_com_code_to_nm(SPEC) AS SPEC, f_com_code_to_nm(UNIT) AS UNIT, PRDT_ID AS PRDT_ID, PRDT_NM AS PRDT_NM, SPEC AS SPEC_CODE, UNIT AS UNIT_CODE, SAF_STC AS SAF_STC FROM PRDT
AND PRDT_ID = #{prdtId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'PRD-'|| LPAD(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(PRDT_ID, -5))) +1, 5, 0) AS PRDT_ID FROM PRDT
INSERT INTO PRDT ( PRDT_ID, PRDT_NM, SPEC, UNIT, SAF_STC ) VALUES ( #{prdtId}, #{prdtNm}, #{spec}, #{unit}, #{safStc} )
